questions.question_text: Which feature allows an agent to copy reusable messages to case or task forms to provide quick and consistent messages to users?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
RESPONSE TEMPLATE IS CORRECT ANS

Selected Answer: C
it's C

Selected Answer: C
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-servicenow-platform/page/product/human-resources/concept/response-templates-templated-snippets.html

Selected Answer: C
C is Correct

Selected Answer: C
Explanation: "Response templates (formerly known as templated snippets) are reusable messages that can be copied to case or task forms to provide quick and consistent messages to users, or to display standard chat response messages to requesters in Agent Chat."

source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-servicenow-platform/page/product/human-resources/concept/response-templates-templated-snippets.html

questions.question_text: In the Customer Service Management space what defines the term asset?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-csm-assets.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/configure-csm-assets.html#:~:text=An%20asset%20is%20a%20specific,is%20supported%20for%20a%20customer.

choices.B: A specific product instance supported for a customer
choices.C: A product that a company supports
choices.D: A resource that allows a business service

choices.A: Escalate a case on the add-m panel of Outlook
choices.C: As the Microsoft Outlook user, register yourself as self-contributor
choices.B: Register the sender of an email as contact
choices.D: Create cases using email content in Outlook for the customer contact

questions.question_text: To which entities can Special Handling Notes be applied out of the box?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
sorry, my earlier answer is wrong, these are the entities where special handling notes can be applied : "* Asset
* Account
* Case
* ﻿﻿﻿Contact
* ﻿﻿Incident
* Product Model
* Work Order Task"
Hence none of the answer is correct, somehow If I have to pick one of the answers I would go with Sold Product as there is Product model option is present, not correct though...

Selected Answer: A
Consumer is the right answer

Selected Answer: B
Special handling notes are used to bring important information to an agent’ attention.
- Entitlement change
- VIP Account & Customer
- Urgent Issue 
- Product recall Alert
Source: E-book
Tested in PDI you can create for Products as a condition on cases
There should be a 4th option. Consumer is not correct
